name: Spiess & Spiess Appartement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's a nice place with really nice maintained rooms and very close to a metro station. It was a perfect place to end our trip. Though we stayed for 1 night, but we really liked the place.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: I didn't go with too high expectations as I can understand the reviews are all very subjective to the individual. And I am glad to have left the high expectations behind.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Admittedly, it had been a pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Loooooved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: Ours was the smallest of the standard rooms. It was on the attic (Dachgeschoss) so part of the ceiling was the roof. While it was the smallest of all the standard rooms, there was still enough space to move around comfortably. There was a bed, 2 armchairs, a writing desk, and a CRT (not flat-screen) TV. There was also a mini-bar.
reviews.title: Doubt the praise at your own risk!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The bathroom was big with a corner bathtub. The water, however, would turn cold for 1 second and back to hot again. That wasn't so pleasant, considering it was winter when we visited.
reviews.title: It's all true! Book without hesitation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: This hotel is an absolute gem. The rooms are huge with every possible need of a traveler anticipated: lots of tables and chairs; multiple outlets; extra towels; supersized bathroom; and a door that stays open to drag luggage in and out. Breakfast was excellent and the room is so pleasant that you find yourself lingering longer than expected. Great coffee! The owners are very pleasant and helpful. I initially thought the location, not directly in the center of town, was this place's sole disadvantage, but later came to appreciate the quiet neighborhood. Amazing value for the money.
reviews.title: Loved it!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: This B & B is literally just a few seconds from the U stop. I timed it from the time we began going down the stairs until we went up the stairs into St. Stephansplatz and it was 5 minutes. Our family could not believe how convenient this location is.
reviews.title: Perfect location and great rooms

likes.liked: — It's location in relation to the subway system.
likes.disliked: — Check-in was not as easy as we had planned after an all-night train ride from Warsaw.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms are very comfortable and the breakfasts are simple and fresh. With several commendable restaurants nearby for lunch or dinner, it is really a great stop for those who have not been in Vienna before. It really helped to talk with Mrs. Speiss about what to do, where to go and how to get there.
reviews.title: Superb! Heavenly...loved it!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everyone was most helpful and seemed very glad to have us staying with them. It was a joy to stay at this location and we are recommending it to our friends who travel to Vienna.
reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here and we were blown away! Shic, clean, modern and wonderfully relaxing. They did our washing AND ironing perfectly. Very helpfull. The breakfasts were amazing. We want to go back again and again. Thank you!!
reviews.title: As good as the reviews say it is

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: Myself and my boyfriend stayed here for two nights this August and we loved it. The apartments are beautiful and spotless. Mrs. Spiess could not have been nicer, and was most helpful to us. I would stay here again most definitely, which I hope to do soon. The metro is two minutes away, and only three short stops to the city centre, and there's a fabulous greek restaurant just across the road also.
reviews.title: Wonderful Apartments

likes.disliked: — Nothing I loved everything about this apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arriving in Vienna after 24 hours of air travel, we needed a quiet but central place to stay. Our expectations were well and truly met, as we arrived at Spiess and Spiess, via the underground railway, ( alight on the Rochgasse end of the station), and it is only a 50 metre stroll. Helped with our bags up the few entrance stairs, we were warmly greeted, and after several emails to and fro, it was good to meet the friendly owner face to face. Up the elevator, and into a wonderful room.
reviews.title: Traveller treat at Spiess & Spiess

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled on business
reviews.text: It was clean and spacious, easy chairs to watch TV from as well, the spotless bathroom modern, with a large bath, separate WC, and many towels. After a glitch with the a/c which soon cooled the room down, we appreciated the finishing touches, fridge, and the delightful private balcony overlooking the summer garden. Comfortable bed, great linen, and very quiet. However only 50 m walk from the first of several restaurants.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast ( included) was the best in our 4 week European trip. Honestly, we could have eaten all day! Hot breakfast available, but so many other choices, all very fresh and generous.
reviews.title: An Amazing place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Currently they are building a sun room further on from the breakfast room, overlooking the beautiful garden, which will add another dimension to this area.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Spiess & Spiess at the end of a 10 day Eastern European trip and it was by far the best place we stayed. Not only was the room spacious and immaculately clean, the air conditioning was a welcome sight. Although all the places I booked claimed to have air conditioning, only Spiess & Spiess had true air conditioning that actually cooled the room - quite necessary during the heat wave Europe was having.
reviews.title: Immaculate and Conveniently Located
Wonderful B&B
reviews.text: The B&B is family run and Mrs Spiess and her son were very welcoming upon our arrival. Mr Spiess is in charge of the breakfasts which are plentiful and delicious. One of the best things we discovered was the proximity to the subway station - just a 1/2 block away, but still in a quiet area of town.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would absolutely stay here again if our travels bring us to Vienna.
reviews.title: B & B Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at Spiess and Spiess for six days in June. It is simply the best B&B we ever stayed in. Mrs. Spiess is so kind and accomodating. Mr. Spiess makes the best breakfasts. If you are planning to go to Vienna look no further. You won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Quite Simply The Perfect B&B Experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our decision to stay at Spiess & Spiess was based on the glowing reviews from fellow travellers, we read here on Trip Advisor and we were not disappointed by our experiences.
reviews.title: All good!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This was a perfect little bed and breakfast in a nice local neighborhood just a few steps away from the train and near some nice restaurants. The service here was excellent. My friend that had arrived a week earlier had her wallet stolen her first day there and they were kind enough to let her pay for her bill when she came back a week later and also allowed her to leave her suitcase there until her return. The breakfast was excellent and they were also always ready to help us with directions and print out anything we needed. I would highly recommend this place.
reviews.title: Great location, breakfast & service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The rooms were some of the most beautiful I have ever seen. Ula is enormously helpful and thoughtful. We were allowed to keep our luggage in the room before our flight home. Very close to the underground station and to many good restaurants yet quiet and secluded. A wonderful place to stay.
reviews.title: Beautiful and accessible

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This property and the service, accommodation and location is amazing! It is hard to describe the property, it is a mix of boutique hotel, bed and breakfast and apartment building. The rooms are large and very comfortable. All the services you would expect from a hotel are there. The breakfast are fantastic and Mr Spiess makes be best scrambled eggs ever.
reviews.title: Visiting Vienna? Look no further than Spiess & Spiess for accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel is a 1 minute walk to the metro, there are many shops and restaurants in close walking distance. The atmosphere is fantastic. highly, Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Very friendly hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This hotel is very comfortable and the owners are extremely accommodating and friendly. Breakfast was excellent. The best scrambled eggs! The only drawback is the location. It's in a nice residential neighborhood but we had to take the safe, fast train to all our destinations.
reviews.title: Too good to be true!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a room for six nights here based on other TA reviews. At first, we thought the hotel to be a bit overrated and not quite what we'd expected from the glowing reviews. A couple of other guests we met at breakfast had the same impression. But overall, we truly thought this a nice property in a good location blessed with an excellent and caring family to oversee day to day operations. The hotel is easy to get to since the local underground station (train 3) is just a hundred meters from the front door. We took the CAT from the airport and transferred to the 'U' for the ride to the hotel. This cost 27 Euros, which seemed a bit much considering that a taxi would have been only 34 Euros. But I wanted to experience the CAT and the public transport system in Vienna, having just come from Switzerland where such things run like clock work. Our room (room 6) was roomy with a nice seating area, and roomy bathroom. It also had a small balcony sitting area where one could smoke cigarettes outside the room. There was a separate toilet room, which was nice. The room had a fireplace, which we didn't use. It also had fridge and stainless steel counter space for a small kitchenette. The breakfast room, as noted in other reviews, is quite pleasant and the breakfast service is all anyone could want. The family grand-dad serves hot coffee and eggs on request. He's quite a nice gentleman. Gabriela, from Hungary, operates the front desk during the day. She is a gem. And the family grandmother takes over on the evening shift. She also quite a charming lady. So, very high marks for the hotel staff. The only glitch we experienced in this regard was for the room cleaning. For our first three days, the glasses in our room went unwashed. We were washing them ourselves when we finally reported this to Gabriela. We also said the bath towels had not been changed for three days. We were told we had to put the towels on the floor to indicate that a change was requested. Fair enough. After that, we had fresh glassware and fresh towels everyday in our room, which made things a lot nicer. One more criticism to make regards the mattresses in our room: they seemed rather worn out and sagging in our sleeping experience, no doubt in need of replacement. The neighborhood has some good places for dinner nearby. We can recommend the Greek restaurant across the street from the hotel. I can say without hesitation, based on our six-night experience, that we'll be back to Vienna for another visit, and we'll definitely be back to Spiess & Spiess.
reviews.title: We enjoyed Spiess & Spiess

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Large room with fireplace, comfortable chairs, spacious bath, and a very helpful staff. Though not in the city center, it is a great, quiet location that is less than 1 block from the subway stop. Gabriella was very helpful in explaining the metro system and how to get around. Breakfast is served in a lovely atrium with linen tablecloths and napkins, and is staffed by a very nice older gentleman who is always willing to make scrambled eggs for you. Plenty of variety for breakfast that includes various pastries, cereals, meats, cheeses, fresh fruit,yogurt, coffee and freshly squeezed juice. Several good restaurants very close by for dinner. Highly recommend.
reviews.title: Great place to stay with excellent location
Home from home in Vienna
reviews.text: Excellent accom and breakfast - great location - highly recommended Room was large and comfy with lovely bathroom and separate toilet - great to come back to after a full day of sightseeing. Breakfast served in the conservatory. Quiet location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If there were more than 5 stars on Tripadivsor, I would give S&S more. Perfect, luxurious, spotless and heavenly! A massive room with fireplace, couch and chairs and bed all in white. Open the windows for a fresh breeze and you will feel like you have stepped into a movie. Location is better than city center. We went into Vienna for the day, came back for a rest, 5-10 minute 2 stop ride on U-bahn, and then headed out again for dinner. Very helpful staff when asked for dinner spots suggested Cafe Diglas near St. Stephan's Church. Loved it! Vienna is an easy city to get around and very walkable. Public transportation is so simple/clean there is no need for taxi's. Enjoy!
reviews.title: What Can I Say?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I hate to say this but this is the best hotel I have stayed at. This review will now probably mean that when I want to book it will be full up! Staff are kind, helpful and always at hand. The rooms are extremely clean and comfortable and everything works. Roger and Cynthia Baker
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: October 2012- Stayed one night/two days at S&S. It is now our only hotel/guesthouse option for Vienna. Location.Location.Location! Ate at the local Greek and Italian restaurants. Both were great. Had a great smoked sausage at the market area near the underground stop. The breakfast was perfect and fresh. Internet was great. The staff made you feel welcomed and cared for. We had just come from Africa, so we will add that the shower pressure was fantastic! Simply looking for another reason to have to stop over again in Vienna. Thank you S&S. We will be customers for life!
reviews.title: All the 5 Star Reviews are Correct!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I stayed at the Spiess & Spiess last May on my way from Canada to Greece. It was the perfect place to recover gently from jet lag.
reviews.title: Perfect inn in a calm residential neighbourhood

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My room was marvellously huge and overlooking the inner courtyards with birds singing and trees, all this within walking distance of all of Vienna's sighs. My friend had a much smaller room but spectacular with its skylights.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: The breakfasts are the bests I ever had anywhere (seriously) and my friend and I almost missed our airplane because we did not want to miss breakfast the last day… :)
reviews.title: Speiss and Spiess is fabulous!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: The couple who own the place are friendly and helpful. They have put together very good maps and documentations. For the fist two nights I was alone and I ate at the restaurants recommended and these were very good choices in the "reasonably priced" category. One was a very cheap little trattoria 3 minutes from the B&B and the other one was a VERY authentic viennese restaurant a few blocks away (nothing fancy but full of locals and delicious).
reviews.title: Kindness at the Spiess and Spiess Pension Appartements in Vienna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. Again, great location, ver cosy, the fireplaces are a nice touch. The high points though are always the proprietors, and this is what stands out. Ulla and her front desk team are very helpful and accommodating. Roland's eggs were the best we have ever had, I don't know how he does it. The rest is all a repeat of what others have said, great location, very clean. This is our new home in Vienna, we suggest you make it yours.
reviews.title: All the features one is looking for!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled with family
reviews.text: This is a wonderful apartment in a great location. From the clean cosy room to the wonderful breakfast you couldn't ask for more (except for maybe coffee making facilities in your room). The location is great with a supermarket close by, a good Italian and Greek restaurant just down the street and best of all a 50 metre walks brings you to the subway with Stephensplatz just 3 stops away. The Viennese have a wonderful easy to use subway system so make the most of it.
reviews.title: Great stay in a great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed 4 nights when visiting my daughter last weak. We could not have chosen a better accommodation. I cannot but agree with all the positive reviews below.
reviews.title: Warm welcome in cold Vienna

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thank you for a wonderful time. I am sure we will be back.
reviews.title: Perfect In Every Way

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't say enough about this charming place, and Ulla and Roland, the owners. Our room had a comfy sofa and love seat, chairs, little refrigerator, spacious closet and large dresser. The bathroom was outstanding, with the toilet and shower, with it's own tiny sink and mirror, off the rest of the bathroom which had a wonderfully large tub and sink. The room even had a fireplace although we didn't use it. We were on the 4th floor in an attic apartment so it was very quiet. I had ordered tickets to the Vienna Boys Choir Mass and Ulla had them there for us when we checked in, along with a map.
reviews.title: Spiess and Spiess review

description: We are a small family owned bed and breakfast in the hearth of Vienna. Spacious, bright, and elegantly furnished rooms of timeless beauty with heated stoneware floorings and large bath tubs in all rooms are what makes us special. Very comfortable beds, AirConditioning, and included breakfast are standard. In one of the best residential areas of Vienna, located in a quiet back street in a (in 2002) remodeled old (originally built just before 1900) house of classical style, yet directly at an underground stop just a few minutes away from all important places in Vienna, we are the perfect place for your stay in Vienna - no matter if for business or pleasure (or both).
